title: Issue Tracker: Error 500 Server Errors
body:
Start at: http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/list
Select "All issues" from the Search drop-down list.
Click on the Search button.

http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/list?can=1&;q=&colspec=ID+Status+Stars+Priority+Owner+Reporter+Summary&cells=tiles

Error 500 (Server Error)!!1

This error has been accepted by Google Project Hosting support.

Internal Server Error when opening issue #919 here
http://code.google.com/p/support/issues/detail?id=5327
